channel.title: Runescape Changes
channel.description:
What would you like to see JaGeX change within RuneScape, maybe revert back to old days (:
- Wilderness re-opened, It's pretty much a waste of space now. - Trade limit dropped, I don't know why, but I have always hated it. - Maybe remove the G.E, And I know people will disagree with me.
Also, does anyone know how JaGeX has a huge cache, but we don't need to download it? Doubley Also, how big do you think there server/source is.
- Tim (:

item.title: Runescape Changes
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:12, topic:375578”]Constitution is pretty much the same as the old Hitpoints, just with higher numbers. You can actually hit slightly higher now since decimals aren’t rounded down like they used to be. And I prefer the new hit-splats since they’re quite a bit more informative (also, the way 0’s work is much better now).

Maybe it’s just me but it seems people hate change no matter what it is in this game. It may take a while to get used to, but it still benefits the game imo. Of course, this is just my opinion, though I don’t really see how the old systems worked any better.[/quote]
I mean, I’m used to them now anyways, so it doesn’t bother me that much.

flj0yter0p:

Trade limit should go, but i disagree about g.e., is it better to yell “buying ####” for a whole hour at bank?

Yes, because then it’s more of a free market without price floors and ceilings.

Read full topic

Mod MMG has stated that the g.e will remain however price restrictions will be removed

item.title: Runescape Changes
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“demonlover14, post:14, topic:375578”]One, why take out Con?
Construction really did not make it any worse, and is actually kinda cool to have your own house.
Also, if free trade comes back, then they should take out the G/E too. …
OR at least remove specific items from it.[/quote]Constitution, not Construction. Construction is the best skill to ever hit RuneScape. The day it came out was amazing.

The GE should not be removed. I don’t miss sitting in Seers Bank for hours trying to buy or sell some items or having a lot of value build up in my bank because I can’t sell single items like herbs.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Changes
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Constitution is pretty much the same as the old Hitpoints, just with higher numbers. You can actually hit slightly higher now since decimals aren’t rounded down like they used to be. And I prefer the new hit-splats since they’re quite a bit more informative (also, the way 0’s work is much better now).

Maybe it’s just me but it seems people hate change no matter what it is in this game. It may take a while to get used to, but it still benefits the game imo. Of course, this is just my opinion, though I don’t really see how the old systems worked any better.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Changes
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:10, topic:375578”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=471515.msg3451106#msg3451106 date=1293753463]
Imagine if they went back even further and brought back the old game frame and the old hit splats and took out shitty constitution. I swear I would cry.
[/quote]
But everything you just listed is better as it is now?[/quote]
I agree with the old hitsplats and HP being better.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

The source is probably fucking huge; imagine: All those quests, Dialogues, Armor, Requirements, Minigames… DAMN.

It would be cool if jagex didn’t keep updating the graphics. It’s kind of gay. Once jagex got past the 508/525 era, It started to get gay.

I wish I could still play the 317 cache era. I was 7-9 when it came out and I thought it was a stupid game. :o

What would you like to see JaGeX change within RuneScape, maybe revert back to old days (:
